oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Highest civilian honor to Hooks"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hooks, Benjamin L.; Presidential Medal of Freedom; 2000s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "The White House announced Monday that Benjamin L. Hooks of Memphis, the former national executive director of the NAACP, will receive one of eight Presidential Medals of Freedom at a ceremony next week."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sullivan, Bartholomew
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Memphis - Biography - Hooks, Benjamin Lawson - Medal of Freedom, 2007
